file.content:
# Big Meanie Development TODO

## Notes
- Never undo user edits
- !!! NEVER MAINTAIN BACKWARDS COMPATIBILITY WHEN MAKING CHANGES TO CODE !!!

## Current Tasks

### High Priority - Documentation Updates
- [ ] Create /docs/architecture/shared-packages.md - Document reusable packages
- [ ] Create /docs/architecture/parameter-system.md - Document ParamSet architecture
- [ ] Create /docs/reference/yaml-package.md - Document YAML package usage
- [ ] Create /docs/reference/strategy-params.md - Document new param loading
- [ ] Update /docs/development/guides/development-workflow.md - Update for new patterns
- [ ] Update /docs/development/guides/technical-indicators.md - Update for ParamSet
- [ ] Archive files referencing old strategy.Config to /docs/archive/

### Next Priority - Use New YAML Package Everywhere
- [ ] Refactor all code to use new /internal/yaml for yaml config handling
- [ ] Update main config loading to use internal/yaml
- [ ] Update database config loading to use internal/yaml
- [ ] Update any other YAML loading code

### Backtest Discuss Later
- [ ] Consider renaming big_meanie.go to mean_reversion.go
- [ ] Consider event-driven architecture for signal processing
- [ ] Add support for distributed backtesting

content.text:
The current high priority tasks are documentation updates. Since these are marked as high priority, I should start with the first one: creating `/docs/architecture/shared-packages.md` to document reusable packages.

Would you like me to start working on the documentation tasks, beginning with documenting the shared packages architecture?
